Description: Photograph (black and white); A White man, Professor Bentley, standing under the stone arch of the entrance to a building; the Roman Arch of the Coptic Museum. Cairo (the 'Arab entrance'); he wears a western-style outfit/suit; Cairo, Egypt. Gelatin silver print.
Producer name: Photographed by: Mary S R Sinclair
Curator's comments: Cataloguer's comment: Album contains 71 photographs. Main themes of album: Travel along Nile through Sudan and Egypt showing indigenous people and settlements, boats used on the river, tombs, temples and monuments in Egypt and the market at Luxor. Albums Af,A8 to Af,A20 and Af,A22 to Af,A33 belong to the same series. Circumstances: [SIN-] PIC DOC 08.
Condition: Album bound in full leather. Good condition.
